item.title: On cycle path, 3rd July
item.description:
The loop to attach the bollard in place via a padlock is broken, so people are taking the bollard out and moving it or trying to hide and are driving along a pedestrian/cycle path as a result. The bollard ensures the area remains an environmentally protected area, however the is no longer the case as cars are no using the cycle path as a popular shortcut
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barker Drive, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

As above.

item.title: Three Point Park Entrance, 2nd July
item.description:
The lamppost outside of the main entrance of Three Point Park is not turning on at night. Others on the surrounding street appear to be fine and there is not a powercut. A recent development but cannot say when it started for sure.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Balmore Street, Dartmouth Park, London

item.title: Hole on the road, 2nd July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayne Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Still blocked (Original report : 6008822), 2nd July
item.description:
Hi - the closing comment from yourselves on this report was asking Thames Water to look into this. I have seen Thames Water investigate and cordon off the area for some time, and during that time witnessed Thames Water do work there. The cordon has been cleared now for maybe a couple of months and wish to advise you that the drain has not been cleared by Thames Water. Maybe they forgot to tell you this still needs unblocking? There have been a few times that rain has made a puddle over this drain, but so far not caused the puddle to be big. However, why not unblock this drain before autumn/winter comes and brings with it significant downpours that will produce a large puddle, that will cause waiting bus passengers to get splashed?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Widmore Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No parking space available on my street at all, 2nd July
item.description:
Hi will like to complain my street has no more parking space available as is an high demand parking due to people who works at Edmonton green shopping center as all others road are with permit holders and they get advantage to park all in Gordon road as i need any restrictions on parking will be great if we put same On our road with permit holders only as all others road next around are with restrictions and they are staying free parks i would like one of you to put urgently this matter im a father of 7 boys and is hard for me to park my car every times couple road away from my house thank you please consider this matter
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gordon Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Restaurant doing building works, 2nd July
item.description:
The restaurant located at 67 Rivington street is doing heavy building works and has people living at the address at night. This has been on going for 6 months with jack hammers recently being used to dig up the flooring.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rivington Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
